column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for bringing this to our attention
column2: Carli. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your pizza but we are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with our staff. If you're open to it
column3: our management team would love the opportunity to speak with you more directly about this. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our management team will be in contact with you. Again
column4: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
